data.name: ServiceWelcomeSentence1
data.value: Your request has been successfully submitted and Drip Doctors will respond shortly!

data.name: ServiceWelcomeSentence2
data.value: An email confirmation has been sent to you. You may check the status of your booking here.

data.name: CallAcceptSentence1
data.value: You have accepted this call and your client has sent a notification.

data.name: CallAcceptSentence2
data.value: This call has been added to your Schedule which can be viewed in your tab menu

data.name: CallCompletedSentence1
data.value: Your schedule has been updated and your status has been changed to Active.

data.name: CallCompletedSentence2
data.value: Now you are available to take new calls
